about.intro: Mirlo provides a user-friendly space to help artists sell digital music, get financial support, manage mailing lists, and share with their supporters.
about.missionStatement: <1>The music industry does not work for artists or listeners and needs a radical re-imagination. </1><1>Mirlo is a community of artists, listeners, and coders who are daring to do just that: taking lessons learned in working in the solidarity economy and applying them to our process and product.</1><1>We are building an online audio distribution (think Bandcamp) and patronage (think Patreon) platform that aims to be radical, accessible, open source (free & libre), modular, and standards based.</1>
about.behindThePlatformText: Our members have experience working both within Resonate and Ampled, other co-ops across several industries, and complex high-traffic web platforms. We envision this platform as a tool to support artists in cultivating direct and reciprocal relationships and resources to sustain one anotherâ€™s creative practice.
about.featuresText:
Mirlo provides a space for artists to upload their music, establish their online presence, sell their music, and gain monthly financial supporters.

For a thorough look at our features for artists, check out our features page.
about.pricingText:
Mirlo takes a 7% cut of all transactions. So if a musician sells an album on for $10, Mirlo will earn 70 cents. Then, our payment processor Stripe, will take a cut, which is 2.9% + 30c (so much larger on small transactions).

Want to know more about how we calculated our take rate? Check out our blog post explaining how we got there.

While we hope to be fully funded by transactions on Mirlo, in the mean time we're dependent on direct monthly financial contributions. Support Mirlo with a monthly contribution.
about.morePricing: As we develop our product and come to terms with costs of running it, we will tweak these numbers and explore new ways of paying for the service and our work

trackGroupCard.notLoggedIn: We'll need your email address to send you a one-time download link of the album. In the future you'll be able to create an account and access what you've bought.
trackGroupCard.albumExists: An album has already been bought using this email address, you can finish creating an account to see it in your collection. Do you want to proceed anyway?
trackGroupCard.downloadDisclaimer: We strongly encourage you to download purchases; we're not always in control of what might be required of us legally to keep the platform and releases up. We think people should try, as much as possible, to keep a local archive of the art that they buy online.
trackGroupCard.notImplemented: Buying an album for variable price hasn't been implemented yet.

home.support: Directly support artists. Buy their music. Collectively owned and managed.
home.sustainedBy: Mirlo's work is sustained by our community, not by venture capital.
home.officeHours: Have more questions? Join us for <office>office hours</office>.
home.featuresLink: What is Mirlo? Check out <features>our features</features> and <about>about section</about>.
home.mirloConstruction:
Wanna talk more? E-mail us, join our Discord, or join us for office hours! Also check out our About page, and the code on GitHub.

Want to just receive our monthly newsletter? Sign up
home.supportUs: Want to support us as we grow Mirlo? <support>Pitch in</support>
